verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H1129>building<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H2837>desire<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he was <S%H2654>pleased<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%>

That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the second <S%H8145>time,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he had <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him at <S%H1391>Gibeon.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and thy <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast <S%H2063>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me: I have <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H1129>built,<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5704>forever;<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3605>perpetually.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> wilt <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1980>walked,<s%> in <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and in <S%H3476>uprightness,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee, and wilt <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and my judgments: <S%H4941><s%>

Then I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of thy <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> There shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3772>fail<s%> thee a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4480>upon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> ye shall at all <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725><s%> from <S%H4480>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> me, <S%H859>ye<s%> or your <S%H1121>children,<s%> and will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, but <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> them:

Then will I cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them; and this <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> for my <S%H8034>name,<s%> will I <S%H7971>cast<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> my <S%H6440>sight;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> and a <S%H8148>byword<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> people: <S%H5971><s%>

And at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> which <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H5945>high,<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H5674>passeth<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> it shall be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and shall <S%H8319>hiss;<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3602>thus<s%> unto <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house?<s%>

And they shall <S%H559>answer,<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and have taken <S%H2388>hold<s%> upon <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and have <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> them, and <S%H5647>served<s%> them: <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%>

(Now <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> had <S%H5375>furnished<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> and <S%H1265>fir<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2656>desire,)<s%> that <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1551>Galilee.<s%>

And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>Tyre<s%> <S%H6865><s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> him; and they <S%H3474>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> him <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> me, my <S%H251>brother?<s%> And he <S%H7121>called<s%> them the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3521>Cabul<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3967>sixscore<s%> <S%H6242><s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>reason<s%> of the <S%H4522>levy<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>raised;<s%> for to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4407>Millo,<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> and <S%H4023>Megiddo,<s%> and <S%H1507>Gezer.<s%>

For <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> had gone <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1507>Gezer,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> it with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H2026>slain<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> it for a <S%H7964>present<s%> unto his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H802>wife.<s%>
And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1507>Gezer,<s%> and <S%H1032>Beth-horon<s%> the <S%H8481>nether,<s%>
And <S%H1191>Baalath,<s%> and <S%H8412>Tadmor<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4543>store<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1961>had,<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> for his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> for his <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2836>desired<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and in <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H4475>dominion.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H3808>not<s%> of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

Their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> also were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3201>able<s%> utterly to <S%H2763>destroy,<s%> upon those did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>levy<s%> a tribute of <S%H4522>bondservice<s%> <S%H5647><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

But of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5650>bondmen:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and his <S%H7991>captains,<s%> and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H5324>officers<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> which bare <S%H7287>rule<s%> over the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H6213>wrought<s%> in the <S%H4399>work.<s%>

But <S%H389><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>city<s%> <S%H5892><s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Solomon had <S%H1129>built<s%> for her: <S%H227>then<s%> did he <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4407>Millo.<s%>

And <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> <S%H854>upon<s%> the altar <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> So he <S%H7999>finished<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a navy of <S%H590>ships<s%> in <S%H6100>Ezion-geber,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H854>beside<s%> <S%H359>Eloth,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8193>shore<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>

And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> in the <S%H590>navy<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H376>shipmen<s%> <S%H591><s%> that had <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3603>talents,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>
